name: Escape from the dead
description: A game made by one middle schooler!  Story. You are drifting on an island and you find a research facility. In this cursed research facility, you try to escape from the island.  Game Overview  This game is a zombie stealth horror game. You must hide from your enemies. Run, hide, and sometimes resist... Anyway, do not get caught. Specs  Recommended  CPU: Intel Core i 3  GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX750 RAM: 4GB           Live situations are welcome.
